title: How Smoking a Few Cigarettes Can Hurt Your Heart
summary: Smoking even a small number of cigarettes each day can be very bad for your heart and health. A big study looked at many people over a long time and found that smoking just two to five cigarettes daily makes it much more likely to have heart problems or die early compared to people who never smoke. This higher risk can last for many years, even after someone stops smoking. The good news is that quitting smoking completely helps reduce the risk, especially if you stop when you are young. The researchers want everyone to know that cutting down on cigarettes is not enough; it's best to quit entirely to protect your heart and live a longer, healthier life.

background_read: Smoking is when people use cigarettes, which contain harmful chemicals. It can cause diseases like heart problems, where the heart doesn't work well. Studies help scientists understand how smoking affects health over time. Quitting smoking means stopping completely, which is important for staying healthy and avoiding sickness.
